simple.gui.scrollbox

Class ScrollBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.Widget
      • simple.gui.scrollbox.ScrollBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScrollDialogBox, ScrollListBox

    public abstract class ScrollBox
extends Widget
    Provides the basic framework for other ScrollBox types. Essentially handles the background of the widget and the up/down buttons, and the side slider.

    Like the Widget class, it is abstract as it is the framework for scrollboxes, not a functional scrollbox. However, as a programmer you must define how the buttons and slider will interact with the class.

    • Field Detail

      • BAR_WIDTH

        protected static int BAR_WIDTH
        Width of sidebar for all new ScrollBoxes. The default value of 20 is typically a good size in all cases, but this may be changed.

      • scrollBar

        protected Slider scrollBar
        Slider object to navigate through the ScrollBox.

      • scrollUp

        protected Button scrollUp
        Up/Down buttons to navigate through the ScrollBox.

      • scrollDown

        protected Button scrollDown
        Up/Down buttons to navigate through the ScrollBox.

      • setScrollWidgetPosition

        protected void setScrollWidgetPosition()
        Resets the position of the scroll widgets. Note: takes into account what BAR_WIDTH is at the time of this call, regardless of what it was before.
